headline: Walker: Theyre Trying to Help Out My Opponent with Fitness Council Removal  Im Going to Beat Him Anyway
author: Jeff Poor
sentences: Friday on Newsmax TVs Spicer & Co., Georgia U.S. Senate candidate Herschel Walker suggested the Biden administration was using its call for his resignation from the Sports & Fitness Council to help out his opponent, incumbent Sen. Raphael Warnock (D-GA).

Walker said he had not considered legal action against the Biden administration and said despite claims his run for the U.S. Senate while holding the fitness council post violated the Hatch Act, he was not being paid in the position.
So, Im going to continue to advocate for kids, but Im going to continue to go out and win the Senate seat, and maybe I can go out and do even more, and they may not be happy with that as well.
This administration is not doing whats great for the state of Georgia, whats great for this country.
I think theyre trying to help out my opponent, which is OK because Im going to beat him anyway.
Its sort of like, whats good for me is not good for thee, and I think all that theyre doing.
Walker said he did not believe the move would prevent him from winning.
But it is OK  the bad policies that theyre doing right now.
The people are sort of waking up now and know it.
Right now, Im in a tough race, he said.
And first of all, Im not paid on this.
Ive advocated for kids my whole life.
I was not paid at all.
